snippet: The longer that Vladimir V. Putin rules Russia, the more reports about his family life seem to be taboo.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin keeps his relationship with his wife and two daughters extremely private and discourages the national press from reporting about his family life.
lead_paragraph: The longer that Vladimir V. Putin rules Russia, the more reports about his family life seem to be taboo.

headline.seo: In Spotlight of Power, Putin Keeps Private Life in Shadows
headline.main: In the Spotlight of Power, Putin Keeps His Private Life Veiled in Shadows
headline.print_headline: In the Spotlight of Power, Putin Keeps His Private Life Veiled in Shadows
